code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginScreen=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const style={backgroundColor:'#ff4f61',width:"100vw",height:"100vh"};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const user={email:email,password:password};try{const response=await axios.post('/api/user/getUser',user);console.log(response);}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"HomeScreen",style:style,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:e=>handleSubmit(e),children:"Submit"})]});};export default LoginScreen;
